document_data.mainbody: ''khazark''' was a title given to those [[Red Wizards]] of [[Thay]] who served as leaders of the nation's [[Thayan enclave|foreign enclaves]]. They held roughly the same authority as the [[autharch]]s of Thayan cities, but were held in high regard due to their membership within the Red Wizards.
document_data.Notable members:
*[[Tola Vrass]], khazark of the enclave in [[Hillsfar]] after the year [[1373 DR]]
*[[Chathin Zurn]], khazark of [[Proskur|Proskur's]] enclave (c. [[1372 DR]])
